CodeplexIssue.Title: Will NetOffice support OneNote?
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml: Would like to use NetOffice to automate OneNote 2010 and 2013, but cannot find any support for it. Will this be put on the roadmap?

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
CodeplexComment.BodyHtml:
i have no experience with one note at all. i want clearify the situation(check for legal licenses and the COM Api) when its possible you have to help to create tests and examples ok?
Sebastian
